Translations.Text: alif, laam, ra. vo is puskat tatha khule quraan kee aayaten hain
(ek samay aayega) jab kaafir ye kaamana karenge ki kya hee achchha hota, yadi ve musalaaman[1] hote
(he nabee!)aap unhen chhod den, ve khaate tatha aanand lete rahen aur unhen aasha nishchet kiye rahe, phir sheeghr hee ve jaan lenge
aur hamane jis bastee ko bhee dhvast kiya, usake lie ek nishchit avadhi ant thee
koee jaati na apanee nishchit avadhi se aage ja sakatee hai aur na peechhe rah sakatee hai
tatha un (kaafiron) ne kahaah he vah vyakti jisapar ye shiksha (quraan) utaaree gayee hai! vaastav mein, too paagal hai
kyon hamaare paas farishton ko nahin laata, yadi too sachon mein se hai
jabaki ham farishton ko saty nirnay ke saath hee[1] utaarate hain aur unhen us samay koee avasar nahin diya jaata
vaastav mein, hamane hee ye shiksha (quraan) utaaree hai aur ham hee isake rakshak[1] hain
aur hamane aapase pahale bhee praacheen (vigat) jaatiyon mein rasool bheje
aur unake paas jo bhee rasool aaya, ve usake saath parihaas karate rahe
isee prakaar, ham ise[1] aparaadhiyon ke dilon mein piro dete hain
ve usapar eemaan nahin laate aur pratham jaatiyon se yahee reeti chalee aa rahee hai
aur yadi ham unapar aakaash ka koee dvaar khol dete, phir ve usamen chadhane lagate
tababhee ve yahee kahate ki hamaaree aankhen dhokha kha rahee hain, balki hamapar jaadoo kar diya gaya hai
hamane aakaash mein raashi-chakr banaaye hain aur use dekhane vaalon ke lie susajjit kiya hai
aur use pratyek dhikkaare hue shaitaan se surakshit kiya hai
parantu jo (shaitaan) choree se sunana chaahe, to ek khulee jvaala usaka peechha karatee[1] hai
aur hamane dharatee ko phailaaya aur usamen parvat bana diye aur usamen hamane pratyek uchit cheezen ugaayeen
aur hamane usamen tumhaare lie jeevan ke sansaadhan bana diye tatha unake lie jinake jeevika daata tum nahin ho
aur koee cheez aisee nahin hai, jisake kosh hamaare paas na hon aur ham use ek nishchit maatra hee mein utaarate hain
aur hamane jalabharee vaayuon ko bheja, phir aakaash se jal barasaaya aur use tumhen pilaaya tatha tum usake koshaadhikaaree nahin ho
tatha ham hee jeevan dete tatha maarate hain aur ham hee sabake uttaraadhikaaree hain
tatha tumamen se vigat logon ko jaanate hain aur bhavishy ke logon ko bhee jaanate hain
aur vaastav, mein aapaka paalanahaar hee unhen ekatr karega[1], nishchay vah sab gun aur sab kuchh jaanane vaala hai
aur hamane manushy ko sade hue keechad ke sookhe gaare banaaya
aur isase pahale jinnon ko hamane agni kee jvaala se paida kiya
aur (yaad karo) jab aapake paalanahaar ne farishton se kahaah main ek manushy utpann karane vaala hoon, sade hue keechad ke sookhe gaare se
to jab main use poora bana loon aur usamen apanee aatma phoonk doon, to usake lie sajde mein gir jaana
atah unasab farishton ne sajda kiya
iblees ke siva. usane sajda karane vaalon ka saath dene se inkaar kar diya
allaah ne poochhaah he iblees! tujhe kya hua ki sajda karane vaalon ka saath nahin diya
usane kahaah main aisa nahin hoon ki ek manushy ko sajda karoon, jise toone sade hue keechad ke sookhe gaare se paida kiya hai
allaah ne kahaah yahaan se nikal ja, vaastav mein, too dhikkaara hua hai
aur tujhapar dhikkaar hai, pratikaar (pralay) ke din tak
(iblees) ne kahaah[1] mere paalanahaar! too phir mujhe us din tak avasar de, jab sabhee punah jeevit kiye jaayenge
allaah ne kahaah tujhe avasar de diya gaya hai
vidhdit samay ke din tak ke lie
vah bolaah mere paalanahaar! tere, mujhako kupath kar dene ke kaaran, main avashy unake lie dharatee mein (teree avagya ko) manoram bana doonga aur unasabhee ko kupath kar doonga
unamen se tere shudhd bhakton ke siva
allaah ne kahaah yahee mujhatak (pahunchane kee) seedhee raah hai
vastutah, mere bhakton par tera koee adhikaar nahin[1] chalega, sivaay usake jo kupathon mein se tera anusaran kare
aur vaastav mein, unasabake lie narak ka vachan hai
us (narak) ke saat dvaar hain aur unamen se pratyek dvaar ke lie ek vibhaajit bhaag[1] hai
vaastav mein, aagyaakaaree log svargon tatha sroton mein honge
(unase kaha jaayega) isamen pravesh kar jao, shaanti ke saath nirbhay hokar
aur ham nikaal denge unake dilon mein jo kuchh bair hoga. ve bhaee-bhaee hokar ek-doosare ke sammukh takhton ke oopar rahenge
na usamen unhen koee thakaan hogee aur na vahaan se nikaale jaayenge
(he nabee!) aap mere bhakton ko soochit kar den ki vaastav mein, main bada kshamaasheel dayaavaan[1] hoon
